TITLE.P: Competition for selection of preliminary design for the facility multi-storey parking garage CP 1.2 (Culture Center Grigor Prlicev) in Ohrid.

SHORT_DESCR.P: Part one- Preparation of a preliminary urban architectural design for the facility — Multi-Storey Parking garage CP 1.2 (Culture Center Grigor Prlicev) in Ohrid.

Part two- Negotiation procedure in accordance with Article 99 paragraph 1 item 3 of the LPP, preparation of project documentation, for construction of Multi-Storey Parking garage CP 1.2 from UPD for GPI in Ohrid. The construction parcel 1.2, planned with UPD for GPI of special interest with purpose E2 — multi-storey parking garage with compatible classes of purpose, for the needs of the Culture Center Grigor Prlicev in Ohrid. The construction parcel is located in the central area of the city of Ohrid and borders on its west side the facility Culture Center Grigor Prlicev. The facility multi-storey parking garage is planned with maximum height of up to 15 m, measured from the level of protective sidewalk to the rim and floorplan of P + 4 floors.

CRITERIA_EVALUATION.P: Evaluation criteria for the preliminary design:
— compliance with the General and Special Conditions for construction from the Detailed Urban Plan, central city area of the city of Ohrid, plan extract no. 16/2016,
— submission of attachments required for the Competition,
— functional organization of the space according to the program requirements,
— designed maximum number of parking spaces with maximum % of compatible purpose (multifunctional business space),
— The creativity and inventiveness of the offered solutions and shaping the facility pursuant to the specified conditions of the competition,
— Originality and innovativeness of the offered design,
— compliance with the standards and norms and other legal regulations for designing such type of facilities.

ADDRESS_WINNER.OFFICIALNAME: Drustvo za proektiranje, procenka, konsalting i inzenering RADIUS ARHITEKTI DOO Skopje
Drustvo za proektiranje, gradeznistvo, inzenering i drugi delovni aktivnosti VEKTOR 90 Tome DOOEL Strumica
Drustvo za arhitektura i gradeznistvo LELELELE DOO Skopje
Fabrika KARPOS-AD za proektiranje, proizvodstvo i montaza na betonski prefabrikati, stanovi, industriski objekti, mostovi i dalnovodi Skopje
Mitko Hadji-Pulja, Betim Zekjiri, Nikola Strezovski

INFO_ADD.P: *For natural person — A or B authorization for preparation of architectural design documentation or a Degree for completed higher education — graduated engineers — architects (copy signed by the natural person- Statement that in the last 5 (five) years that no effective verdict has been issued against the natural person for participation in a crime organization, corruption, fraud or money laundering (personal statement),- Statement from the legal entity verified by Notary Public where the legal entity shall state that it agrees to continue with the procedure for awarding the contract for public procurement of services, for the preparation of the preliminary and basic project under the conditions of the competition, if the natural person, participant in the procedure for selection of preliminary urban — architectural design, submitter of the Statement, is the highest-ranked participant and is offered to continue with the procedure for awarding the public procurement contract.

REVIEW_PROCEDURE.P: Jury: The evaluation of conceptual solutions submitted in the contest, will be performed by a jury appointed by the contracting authority, composed of experts from the 5 members. The jury shall be independent in making their decisions.
The jury will evaluate the submitted designs according to the evaluation criteria, which will report to the contracting authority and the participants in the contest.
Deadlines for delivery of competitive solutions:

The deadline for submission of conceptual urban architectural solutions is 35 days from the date of publication of the competition of the Bureau for Public Procurement in the Official Gazette, through the archives of the Joint Stock Company. For competition works sent by mail shall prevail date of postmark.
